item.title: Senior MS Commerce Server/C#.NET Programmer (financial district)
item.description:
DHC USA Inc. is a private U.S. subsidiary of DHC Corporation, the largest direct mail skincare company in Japan. In addition to skincare, we are a leading distributor of makeup, body, baby, and men's care products that are based on the beneficial properties of extra virgin olive oil.

We are seeking a Senior MS Commerce Server/C#.NET Programmer at our US corporate office. This person will administer, customize, and support DHC WEB site using MS Commerce Server 2003/2007.

This is a full-time position scheduled to work for 40 hours per week M-F.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following but are not limited to:

- Enhancements to existing C#.NET code, integration of MS Commerce Server with the main DHC system (OMatePro)
- MS IIS administration
- MS SQL Server development (stored procedures, TSQL, some DBA)

Tasks will be assigned and results will be reviewed by Lead Programmer. This person has to be able to work independently with minimum supervision.

Minimum Qualifications:

Education:
Bachelor Degree

Special Skills/Knowledge:
 At least 3+ years experience in MS Commerce Server, multi-tier web application development

 At least 5+ years experience in developing complex web applications using Microsoft IIS, ASP.NET, C#.NET, VBScript, Javascript, XML, Microsoft SQL Server and best of breed tools & technologies.

 At least 5-7 years experience working at a single company building product(s) from concept to completion across multiple releases and several dot releases

 Ability to develop efficient & well-documented code

 Strong understanding of database design. Working knowledge of the SQL server 2000/2005.

 Experience with XML related technologies and Service Oriented Architectures (SOAs)

 Ability to write design documents, technical functional specifications and communicate effectively with rest of the organization

 Experience with agile development processes in addition to traditional software development methodologies and processes. Experience with the full life cycle of web application development

 Strong attention to detail. Dedication to completing work on time-sensitive projects, strong project management skills a plus.

 Other tasks as required

Related Work Experience:
At least 7 years of experience in related area.

DHC is located in downtown San Francisco near MUNI and Bart. Full time employees are eligible to enroll in Medical, Dental, Vision, and Life benefits after 90 days. Other benefits include product discounts and PTO accrual.

No agencies, no calls please! Sorry, we are not able to provide a sponsorship. DHC USA Inc. is an EOE.

Please submit your resume to employment@dhccare.com and in the subject line please write "Senior MS Commerce Server/C#.NET Programmer. You can also fax your resume to (415) 544-0750.

You MUST include your salary expectation in your cover letter in order to be considered.

Please visit our website at www.dhccare.com to learn more about DHC care!
item.dc:title: Senior MS Commerce Server/C#.NET Programmer (financial district)
